Uptick Strata Management

ABA Strata provides tools for strata managers to improve communication with owners, consolidate reporting from suppliers and contractors, and powerful workorder and tendering tools to streamline back office operations.
Contact us now to find out more read more

Owner portal

Interact with your owners, decrease your administrative overhead.

Portfolio analytics

Understand your property portfolio and manage your compliance risk.

Uptick provides a rich set of tools, enabling you to make better decisions about your portfolio and eliminate paperwork and effort managing compliance risk.

For facilities management companies, we also offer tools to understand manager effectiveness and radically boost efficiency by increasing the number of properties each manager is able to effectively deal with.
